data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kovacs, Gabor, Prazsak, Istvan, Eichardt, Janos, Vari, Gabor, Gyurkovics, Henrik (2015): A new ladybird spider from Hungary (Araneae, Eresidae). ZooKeys 494: 13-30, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.494.8676, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.494.8676
